title: Xamarin 4.0 and SkiaSharp
body:
Hi People.

I am updating my project to Xamarin 4.0, and I am using skiaSharp 1.68.0 but I have this problem.

/Users/LALA/Projects/Clarika/Imperial-ClienteFiel/ClienteFiel.Forms.iOS/MTOUCH: Error MT0009: Error while loading assemblies: /Users/hugo/.nuget/packages/skiasharp/1.68.0/runtimes/win-x86/native/libSkiaSharp.dll (MT0009) (ClienteFiel.Forms.iOS)

My question.

Do support SkiaSharp the new version o Xamarin?

Thx!

comments.author: HugoTruffe
comments.body: In Android is running correctly, only in iOS is the bug

comments.author: evelynhull710
comments.body: I'm having exactly the same problem

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: @HugoTruffe @evelynhull710 do you have more information on the versions of the IDE and Xamarin.iOS? You can get this from the IDE's about dialog.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: This appears to be a duplicate of https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/855

comments.author: amirvenus
comments.body: I am having the same problem. I cannot build Xamarin.Forms.iOS anymore
